# The Tests of the Sierra Madre
## An amusing placeholder for tests
### Joke stolen from @AvianFlu

#### Use In Your `package.json`:

```json
{
  "name": "test",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "description": "Test for \"tests-of-the-sierra-madre\"",
  "main": "index.js",
  "dependencies": {
    "tests-of-the-sierra-madre": "~0.0.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "tests-of-the-sierra-madre"
  },
  "author": "Joshua Holbrook",
  "license": "BSD"
}
```

#### Run `npm test` For Lulz

### Available for All: WHY NOT?

    sudo npm install tests-of-the-sierra-madre -g
